devdoc.details: Contract for managing NFT-collateralized microloans using ETH

params.loanId: The ID of the loan to fund
The ID of the loan to liquidate

repay(uint256).details: Repay a loan with ETH and retrieve the NFT

params.loanId: The ID of the loan to repay

returns._0: loanId The ID of the created loan
